text: I'd love to get a sequel to this game, but I know that will never happen. There really isn't anything else quite like it. It gave me vibes of a Tales game mixed with Shenmue thanks to the 24 hours system and NPCs having their own schedules. Great humor as well, and kicking everything could get quite... addicting.
author: SupraDarky

text: It's a shame how underrated this game is. I don't regret a little beating the game 3 times to get all the companions.
author: Willian Lex

text: I absolutely loved this game, but everyone I've mentioned it too had no idea what I was talking about.  It really is a great and underrated game.
author: Jon Man

text: SupraDarky so this game isn't related to radiant historia?
author: Purple Dawn

text: Completely unrelated lol
author: Duke Von Shnozz

text: Not completely unrelated.  A chunk of the Radiant Historia team came from this game.  It was always my understanding that it's why the name was chosen.
author: totlyepic

text: DoctorPsyduck that's kind of weird. Of all the names they could've chosen, why choose one that's almost exactly the same?
author: Purple Dawn

text: totlyepic that makes sense. But the games themselves aren't that similar? I haven't played Radiata stories or Radiant Historia, so I wouldn't know.
author: Purple Dawn

text: The gameplay is very different
author: Jon Man

text: I really waned a prequel focusing on Elwen and Alfred since we never got to learn much about them. If they did a sequel though, I'd love for them to not really have a canon ending from the first game, maybe giving us two alternate dimensions based upon the two routes and forcing us to pick between one of the dimensions while the other possibly gets destroyed. What I'd really love though is for them to remake this on 3ds. The graphics would pop out so beautifully.
author: Windy Tollett

text: I only played it for a few hours but i thought it was pretty similar to star ocean, at least the combat.
author: ragnaroktomorrow

text: I'm not aiming high, just a PS4 release would be nice, but that's not going to happen is it? And yes, the kicking is very addicting.

text: You will lost when you down your hopes ! I am still hoping a remaster for sure a little chance for sequel.And i am sure, we will get it one day.FOR SURE !

text: This game was a lot of fun, but I felt the writing fell pretty flat once the storyline split happened... it was a bit disappointing.

text: It's probably the opposite for most people, but I will always see the title of this game and think Radiant Historia

text:
It's hard to think of another game like this one, it was a good experience. 
Maybe we will see a sequel or spinoff at some time?

text: One of my favourites Rpgs of all time. I played it when I was the same age as Jack, and loved his character. The comedy, the music, the vast character cast. Even visually it's beautiful.

text: Awesome game! I picked it up on a whim years ago while looking for new PS2 games to play, and saw that it was developed by Tri-Ace, so I had to get it. Definitely a unique game. Odd that Iwadare did the music though, considering it was published by Square Enix.
